author: atomopawn
message: Pardon my ignorance, but is there a place where I can grab your latest SVN version so I can play with some of these changes? Is the "daily snapshot" from www.kipi-plugins.org the best way or can I use anonsvn from some place?

author: Aur√©lien
message:
All KIPI code is hosted in KDE svn.
libkipi is in kdegraphics, but kipi-plugins are in extragear/graphics for now.
